v1.0.0.description:
## Two long months of coding, debugging, and play… and at last! The Grinch apworld is here today! The very first one i've coded, released with such flair. Now that the Grinch is in Archipelago, the chaos is everywhere!


### How to Connect & Setup
- No patching required, oh what a surprise! Just open Bizhawk Client and emulator. That’s wise.
- Works on Bizhawk 2.9.1, at least that’s been tried, Other versions? Untested, so proceed open-eyed.
- And yes, you’ll be needing an NTSC Bin ROM, to play The Grinch proper, so stay cool, stay calm.


### New Stuff
- **Missions give checks!** Every squash, every gift, complete them, collect them, and watch logic shift!
- **Blueprintsanity!** Each blueprint’s a check, tucked in a corner, or high up a deck.
- **Heartsanity!** Every Heart of Stone that you see, is a location to mark, a new place to be.
- **Unlimited eggs** if you wish, what a treat, Rotten yolks raining down, oh how sweet!
- And the **goal of the run** is a sleigh-building quest: You’ll need vacuums, gadgets, and keys to progress!


### FAQ
- **Need a ROM to generate?** No, not at all.
- **Found a bug?** Head to Discord, give a call! Ping *SomeJakeGuy* for client tech woes, or ping *MarioSpore* if it’s logic that shows.
- **Will `X` be added?** Perhaps down the line. Traps, groups, giftsanity… ideas sound fine!
- **Why so sexy?** Oh goodness, behave! The Grinch may be cool, but let’s not misbehave!


### Known Bugs
- Unlimited eggs. If you shoot City Hall’s clock, may scramble your hearts and your yolk-count in shock. (We *think* it is fixed… but please send a vid. If you see it again, don’t keep it well-hid!)
- Beyond that? Not much, though chaos will grow… new edge cases may surface, as all coders know!


So join in the fun, bring mischief and glee, The Grinch in Archipelago is waiting for thee! Squash gifts. Fling eggs, and watch logic bend, for this is the start… not the ultimate end.
v1.0.0.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.0.0

v1.0.1.description:
There was a bug, it was squashed with a bop. It flipped and it flopped till it came to a stop. The Grinch had been glitchy, all scrambled and frayed. But now he is fixed and he’s ready to play!

- Fixed Squashing all Missions not sending their checks.
- Fixed a client bug that could trigger too soon in rare specs.
v1.0.1.title: The Grinch (PS1) -v1.0.1

v1.0.2.description:
Ah yes… the Grinch has *client issues*. Who could have guessed? Another round of bug fixes, to keep things… *slightly less stressed.*

* Fixed potential crashes if the client threw errors.
* Fixed items resetting when the client disconnects (terrifying terrors!).
* Rotten Egg Launcher is no longer required in the Guardian House’s right-side blueprint if you have the Grinch Copter.
* Fixed minor generation quirks.
* Corrected regions for possible future perks.
* Fixed duplication with an unused option, too.

One more patch down… but the Grinch still has mischief to do!
v1.0.2.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.0.2

v1.0.3.description:
Oh mercy me… for the *second time* we’re here! Fixing OR conditions, to make logic more clear.

- Fixed multiple lists in a given location not being read. Now generation and UT should place checks as they’re led.
v1.0.3.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.0.3

v1.1.0.description:
Another glorious atrocity. I've wasted away, creating these new, dreadful "features" for all you greedy, noisy Whos down below. You're welcome... I guess.

- I've made some changes, though I wish I had not, to a bunch of features, to rot and to blot.
- I put five new crates in a five new spots, so you can waste more time tying your knots.
- I've added a wretched, new, disgusting thing, so your eggs sync with friends, what a mess it will bring!
- Now you know how to play, it’s all laid out to see, go set up the game and just leave me be.
v1.1.0.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.1.0

v1.1.1.description:
Ah, yet more tinkering, yet more repair. Fixes for crashes and logic laid bare!

- Fixed SADX/SA2B Ringlink crashes, no more sudden despair.
- Fixed Minefield logic. No Slime Shooter required there.
v1.1.1.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.1.1

v1.1.2.description:
Another patch, another pile of Grinchy glue, fixing the chaos I once gave to you!

- Fixed double receiving/removing eggs when gadgets or collections meddled.
- Fixed negative int bugs that crashed the client when numbers got unsettled.
- Fixed mission items not sending, or being grabbed the boring vanilla way.
- Added UUIDs, so multiple Grinches won’t fight in the same sleigh.
v1.1.2.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.1.2

v1.2.0.description:
## Changes
- Whoville’s been added, a dreadful new pool. Now more places for mischief, oh isn’t that cruel?
- Locations renamed, all tidy, all neat. Though, I’d rather they stayed messy under my feet.
- Items renamed to match the manual of lore! Descriptions more accurate, pulled from times of yore.
- Groups for your junk, items and spots. Sorted disasters in hideous lots.
- A /ringlink command, to share eggs with your friends. Misery travels, and never quite ends.
- YAMLs adjusted, oh what a bore! Changes you’ll notice, though I’ll gripe even more.
- Goal now triggers before the credits, not after! No need to wait for all that blather!
- The client now prints “Now can send locations” with cheer, when you exit the game and then reappear.
## Fixes
- No longer will Who Cloak or Scout Clothes appear, when Crumpit’s reward should instead land here.
- No longer sending locations when sliding to demo. That sneaky transition won’t cause such a show.
## New Team Member!
Artamiss has joined, oh wonderful, great! Another poor soul to help seal your fate!
v1.2.0.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.2.0

v1.2.1.description:
## Changes
- YAMLs adjusted, prepared for the day... when future additions come creeping your way.
## Fixes
- No more nasty crashes, no errors to see... when toggling Ringlink and eggs endlessly.
v1.2.1.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.2.1

v1.2.2.description:
## Fixes
- Fixed Ringlink’s tantrum when pausing the show. No more disconnects when you stop the flow!
- Exhaust Pipes now need Whoville’s Tube in the plan. Logic restored, as it always began.
## Known Issues
- Strange /ringlink behavior when Grinches unite. Multiple games caused quite the fright!
- Tip Toe now missing till Whoville’s Clock Tower scene plays. Though logic’s behind, it’ll catch up one of these days.
  - Starting in Who Lake? Just push past the bats! No softlocks here, imagine that!
v1.2.2.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.2.2

v1.2.3.description:
## Fixes
- Fixed that foul bug where you couldn’t reach goal. Now victory’s possible, body and soul!
- Added archipelago.json, a manifest scheme. For future-proof plans and developer dreams.
## Known Issues
- Strange /ringlink behavior when Grinches unite. Multiple games caused quite the fright!
- Tip Toe now missing till Whoville’s Clock Tower scene plays. Though logic’s behind, it’ll catch up one of these days.
  - Starting in Who Lake? Just push past the bats! No softlocks here, imagine that!
  - Civic Center’s tricky, a perilous place. With bats and guards you can’t outpace. Without Sneak, disaster may knock. A softlock awaits, a Grinchy shock! Until v1.3, be smart and keen. Exclude “Civic Center” from your scene. 
    - If you must play, to avoid the despair. start with or receive the Whoville Vacuum Tube early, fair and square!
- Soft restarting while linked to Bizhawk’s delight. May spews checks all through the night!
v1.2.3.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.2.3

v1.3.0.description:
## Changes
- **Moverando arrived!** A curious name! The Grinch can't just sneak to the start of the game! He'll wait for the item that grants him the right, To slink through all Whoville, both morning and night!
- **Item Weights were tinkered!** A delicate plan, To send the Grinch back to old Crumpit-land! Perhaps you'll go often, perhaps just a few, And eggs, you may get many, or maybe a few!
- **The Code got a polish!** Refractored, they say! Our thanks to Artamiss for clearing the way! More features are coming, a fanciful queue, For future updates, and the Grinchy things to do!
- **You now pick the Vacuum!** The start of the haul! Whichever bright tube, you can enter it all! First choice is yours now, a wonderful sight, To zoom where you wish, start things off right!
- **New checks** were placed in two spots, it is true, In Crumpit and Who Lake, waiting for you! Take a peek through the telescope, what horrors you'll find, and in the Scoutmaster hut, he's now in a bind!
- **Teleporting power!** A warp quick and grand! To the Computer Room on Mount Crumpit's land! (Hold Start and both Triggers, a magical flip!) Or right to the tippy-top (Start and Both Shoulders for the trip!) This helps when you're stuck in a sticky, tight plight, And locked up in Crumpit without yet your might!
- **Universal Tracker Support!** Universal and bright! Now all of your progress is clear to the sight! No YAML to connect to your slot, we hope you like this one quite a lot!
# Fixes
- **A Known Bug In a Trap** Dumpit-To-Crumpit has a glitch that is known, Where death-scene-Grinch flew to a spot unknown!
- **Early Goaling is back!** Hooray for the change! No waiting forever! No need to delay! A long, boring skip just to be freed! Goal early and fast, no credits to read!
- **YAML Validation** Ringlink is locked—a rule we must employ — If unlimited eggs are yours to enjoy! No rings when you're bursting with all that you need, A fine rule for fairness, a Grinchy good deed!
v1.3.0.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.3.0

v1.3.1.description:
- **Logic Fixes**
  - Max helps to drill canoes on the north shore, we now account for this for sure.
  - Up on the Ski Resort, Grinch Copter is a useful card, to get the blueprint in the dog's yard.
- **Trap Update** The Depletion Trap now gives 1 egg, not none. To get rotten eggs, there's now less reason to run. Originally a bug in the code, now it's a feature to behold!
- **Option Group** Options are grouped in sections for ease, this makes changes easier, yes please.
- **Checks no longer send early** Some checks were being sent in error. No more must you suffer this horror. Submarine World and Scout Clothes were being sent when they shouldn't, but now the Grinch's play can be much more congruent
v1.3.1.title: The Grinch (PS1) - V1.3.1

v1.3.2.description:
## Bug Fixes
- Logic as broken as the Grinch's small heart. To resolve this, the Grinch must instead be smart. Use Bad Breath while up on the Who's Ski Resort. To enter Max's Cave with no who retort.
- While fighting the scout leader in his hut over Who Lake, the moose-like Scoutmaster's clothes the Grinch was failing to take. If this bug is something you face, update to this patch with haste.
v1.3.2.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.3.2

v1.3.3.description:
## Changes

- **Logical fixes and adjustments**, thanks to the Whos. That’s you!:
  - Slime Shooter no longer guards the Generator’s door, enter freely now, it blocks you no more.
  - Who Cloak can sneak you into the Clock Tower too. Not just fashion, but function! Who knew?
  - Pancake is no longer demanded to snag North Shore blueprint, drill house and crow perch rejoice.
  - Fixed a missed logic check: Squashing all Gifts in Who Forest now correctly needs Grinch Copter.
- **YAML changes**. Usable ones, imagine that:
  - `exclude_environments` can now ban whole regions you despise. Gone in one swoop, before generation even tries.
    - Or force filler locations instead if you’re picky but fair. Location groups exist, use them. I swear.
  - `giftsanity`... partial! Removes all Squashing all Gifts mission checks.
  - `missionsanity`:
    - `none` or `individual` now fully remove missions.
    - Most mission items are skipped to help generation behave. Instead, you’ll just get them. How brave!.
    - Exceptions remain: Who Cloak, Cable Card Access Card, Scout Clothes.
  - YAML renames and tweaks continue their spree. Regenerate your YAML? Yes, obviously.
  - Fixed descriptions referencing unused commands; multi-bind is now explained to reduce confusion.
  - A funny option to remove Grinch Copter exists. Slower checks, harder life, true Grinchy bliss.
    - Note: Enabling `exclude_gc` also removes *Squashing all Gifts* missions (hard logic says no).
  - Options tagged [NOT IMPLEMENTED] are officially gone, until they do something real in a future dawn.
  - `progressive_vacuums` is now fully complete, following the original game’s progression. Neat!

## Fixes

- Fixed telescope not retriggering after Dump it to Crumpit.
- Fixed boulder check only sending when pushed left. Rude!.
- Scout Battle checks adjusted: once logic grants the move and you enter the Scout Hut, his clothes are obtained automatically. no more awkward Who wardrobe issues.
v1.3.3.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.3.3

v1.3.4r2.description:
## Fixes
- A quick little patch, oh don’t make a fuss! Generation errors fixed (you’re welcome, not us).
Missionsanity and Giftsanity now behave as they should, no more tangled logic where clean logic stood!
v1.3.4r2.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.3.4

v1.4.0.description:
## Changes
- We’ve added new checks for each step and each chore, for snowmen and rats and so many things more! If the names of these checks don't sound quite right to you, please send us a letter (just not by who).
- The `!countdown` command is now twice as much fun, it counts in the game 'til the counting is done! From one to two-hundred-and-fifty-four, the game says it simply won't count any more.
- When you visit a land for the very first time, the check will now pop at the start of the rhyme! It triggers the moment the cutscene begins, not when the Grinch out the vacuum tube, grins.
- The YAML is tidy! The YAML is neat! We’ve grouped all the options to make them a treat. With categories for locations and settings, it’s cleaned up nicely, like the Grinch's inventings.

## Bug Fixes
- The Ring Link was wonky and acting quite strange, so we’ve given the logic a bit of a change! It won’t try to send on the menu or demo, it waits for a file—we’ve gotten the memo.
- We tossed out some commands that did nothing at all, like `/dumpittocrumpit` (it had quite a fall). We swept `/tutorialland` right out the door, but your controller button combos still work as before!
- For Traps and for Fillers, we’ve set a new rule, to keep all the weights in a sensible pool. From zero to one-hundred is where they must stay, so the Grinch doesn't grumble and ruin your day!

Note: If you’re mid-run and don’t want a fright, don't download the update tonight! This patch changes YAMLs and checks by the score, and old worlds won't open or work anymore.
v1.4.0.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.4.0

v1.5.0-PR.description:
# Notice
Keep in mind that this is a beta release and is not currently ready for a full release. Do not bring this into serious groups unless you know what you are doing. This is for testing purposes only to ensure everything is ready when this update gets a full release. Report bugs and check certain things to make sure everything works as intended.

# Changes
- Updated to require AP v0.6.6 to encourage people to update with security patch.
- Deathlink! Keep in mind that every area you are able to die in except for Mount Crumpit, Clock Tower, Post Office, & Sleigh Room due to ingame issues I encountered during testing.
- Gadgets are now given to you sooner! No longer you are required to use the computer to get the gadget. Just reload/enter a new area to get the gadgets on demand!
- Sleigh Parts are now items in the pool! Find them through out the multiworld and enter the sleigh ride with the Sleigh Room Key! Because of this, the sleigh part locations are temporarily removed for the time being.
- Grass.
- Presents are in the pool aswell. These are items that do nothing to the game if you decide to not want to add rotten eggs to the pool.
- Mission completion for squashing all gifts should be removed if you exclude at least one subarea per area. For example if you have `giftsanity` enabled and you have excluded on of Whoville's subareas, the mission will be removed.
- Added new `misc_checks` option. Adds various categorized locations in the multiworld. From platforms to killsanity, and other funny locations.
- Few new item/location groups

# Bug Fixes
- Fixed bug regarding certain locations sending when they should not be.
- Elevator in Mount Crumpit should hopefully be positioned in the right level when using the teleport multibind
- Various small logic tweaks and fixes that went overlooked.

# Things to do until full release
- Fix Heart of Stone locations sometimes not sending
- Support for incremental location checks
- OR condition addresses for locations
- ~~Fix fuzzer errors~~

There are probably many more changes I missed. Look around and see what you can spot!
v1.5.0-PR.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.5 Pre Release

v1.5.0-PR2.description:
# Notice
Keep in mind that this is a beta release and is not currently ready for a full release. Do not bring this into serious groups unless you know what you are doing. This is for testing purposes only to ensure everything is ready when this update gets a full release. Report bugs and check certain things to make sure everything works as intended.

# Changes
- Sleigh Room Key now skips balancing

# Bug Fixes
- Fixed major logic bug for `WD - Feeding The Computer With Robot Parts - Who Bris Shack Area` not requiring `Seize`.
v1.5.0-PR2.title: The Grinch (PS1) - v1.5 Pre Release 2

# Notice
Keep in mind that this is a beta release and is not currently ready for a full release. Do not bring this into serious groups unless you know what you are doing. This is for testing purposes only to ensure everything is ready when this update gets a full release. Report bugs and check certain things to make sure everything works as intended.
